programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Wounded
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 186 After being fired upon by a Cardassian vessel, Picard races against time to find out the facts behind the Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Devil's Due
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 187 While answering a distress call, Picard finds himself not sure of exactly who he is dealing with, but he's sure he's NOT dealing with the planet's version of The Devil, as she claims to be.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Clues
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 188 Effects of passing through a wormhole give the Enterprise crew a sense that they were unconscious for more than the thirty seconds they've been led to believe.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - First Contact
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 189 Commander William Riker has been on an acculturation mission under an alias for months on the Arkonian planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Galaxy's Child
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 190 While the Enterprise is in a star-base, Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge gets a very special visitor, brilliant engineering designer Dr. Leah Brahms, who he feels to know almost intimately as a 'hologram version' of herself with 'whom' he bonded.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Night Terrors
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 191 The Enterprise has finally tracked the missing starship USS Britain. Counselor Deanna Troi senses trouble with the life on board and joins Riker's boarding party.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 192 Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge and an old friend fight to defeat a parasite that is trying to transform them into another species.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Nth Degree
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 193 When assigned to investigate an unknown probe, Lt. Barclay is electrocuted through a shuttlecraft's computer, where he receives an unexplainable boost of confidence and a vast increase in his knowledge.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Qpid
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 194 The Enterprise is at Tegus 3, to host the Federation archaeologists council's annual symposium, where Picard is to give the key-note lecture on its enigmatic ruins, now forbidden to outsiders.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Drumhead
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 195 A retired admiral boards the Enterprise in an effort to determine the actions aboard the ship surrounding an act of sabotage and possible treason.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Half a Life
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 196 Counselor Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and becomes infatuated with a man whose culture forces him into a suicidal ritual called "The Resolution."

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Host
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 197 Dr. Crusher falls for someone who's not at all what she expects him to be.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Mind's Eye
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 198 Geordi is brainwashed by the Romulans to assassinate a Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E21 - We're So Screwed, Part 3: La Bomba
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Scorpius has betrayed the crew. Now they're all captured. Their plan failed, the crew has little choice but to help Scorpius's true agenda.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E22 - Bad Timing
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 With their Crystherium stores low, the Scarrans must travel to Earth through a wormhole as those flowers grow there.

programme.title: Replicant - Replicant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Kill Switch - Kill Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

programme.title: Replicant - Replicant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Kill Switch - Kill Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

programme.title: Encounter - Encounter
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: Day The World Ended - Day The World Ended
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In a post-apocalyptic world after an atomic war, seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Nightwatch - When Work Becomes Family
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 It's New Year's in New Orleans and gun violence is rampant as Police and EMS deal with armed robberies and shootings. Plus, EMT Gavin returns to the job, and everyone celebrates a new addition to the family.

programme.title: Nightwatch - In the Blink of an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Swat officers J. and Alley come face-to-face with the violence in the city after a high-speed chase turns into a shootout with their suspect.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Fallen Brother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The city is in mourning after a well-loved Police officer is shot and killed on duty. Vic and P chase a suspect following an altercation with another officer.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Mardi Gras
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Mardi Gras is the biggest party of the year in Southern Louisiana, and it doesn't just happen in New Orleans. Terrebonne Parish is home to the second biggest Mardi Gras in the state.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Hunt for the Swamp Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The local shrimpers in Terrebonne Parish are notorious for handling their own problems and don't like interference from the cops.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Geaux Speed Racers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Terrebonne Parish can be a tough place for teenagers to find weekend entertainment, so deputies will investigate all sorts of calls involving the bayou's most troublesome kids.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - The Great Swamp Escape
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In Terrebonne Parish, the shrimping season is about to get underway as fishermen are getting their trawl boats ready and stretching out their nets.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two restaurant workers use their wrestling moves on an armed robber; a young surfer is beaten after wandering onto a locals-only beach; a family feud erupts at a wedding reception.

programme.title: Most Daring - Fight For Survival
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A thrillseeker takes a tumble from his snowmobile in British Columbia, Canada; a man loses control of his superbike; two lions attack their keeper.

programme.title: Most Daring - Craziest Crimes Caught on Tape
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Thugs attacking a wheelchair-bound man are shocked when he fights back; food thief; bank surveillance cameras record a smash-and-grab heist.

programme.title: Most Daring - Horror on the Highway 3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A car crashes into a fuel pump, turning a gas station into a deathtrap; bystanders race to save a family trapped in a burning car in the middle of highway traffic; two cars crash through a store's front doors.

programme.title: Court Cam - Top 10 Moments
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A one-hour special featuring the best moments from season one of A&E's Court Cam.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 203
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: An emotional trial leads to an all-out brawl outside a Massachusetts courthouse; a defendant assaults his own attorney; the mother of a murder victim forgives her son's killer; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 207
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: Fists fly when a quiet Michigan courtroom erupts into an all-out melee; a pro-pot defendant lights up right in front of a judge.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two restaurant workers use their wrestling moves on an armed robber; a young surfer is beaten after wandering onto a locals-only beach; a family feud erupts at a wedding reception.

programme.title: Crime 360 - Crime 360
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Toxic Web of Deceit
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 124 The story of the excruciating and sudden death of a healthy 60-year-old woman and how detectives traced the killer, despite their calculated and elaborate web of deceit.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Lured to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 125 A killer stalks and gains his victim’s trust, and investigators keep the case open for almost two decades, until scientific advances allow them to bring the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: The First 48 - Devil's Candy (#23)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Soon after discovering a bullet-ridden body in the Overtown section of Miami, Sgt. Joe Schillaci learns the murder may spark a bloody turf war between rival heroin dealers in the neighborhood.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fallen / Texas Burning (#26)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In Miami, a young man's body is found next to a high-rise, a victim of an apparent suicide. But the investigation takes a twist when Sgt. Joe Schillaci discovers signs of a struggle on the victim's body.

programme.title: The First 48 - Murder in the Driveway / Double Shooting in the Beans (#25) (2005)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 In a case of young man shot dead in Little Haiti, Miami Detective Ervens Ford and his team learn the suspected killer is a member of a notorious gang. The team must hunt him down, before he flees the country.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Nightmare/Birthday Girl
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 In Cleveland, a 14-year-old girl was gunned down at her own birthday party when rival gangs opened fire.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Love Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 An armed robbery escalates into capital murder and rocks a residential Houston neighborhood. One man is left for dead while his killers flee into the night. Four years later, will justice finally be served?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Easy Money
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 A robbery at a Cleveland convenience store turns deadly when a store clerk is shot and killed. As police track down the men responsible, they discover more robberies and a second homicide that can be tied to the same suspects.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Hot Ride
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 A carjacking-turned-murder leaves a youth minister dead. Two men are caught and one suspect turns on the other. But, a last-minute change of heart changes everything.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Body Parts in My Pocket
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 74 A California serial killer shows up at a local sheriff's department with a victim's body part in his jacket pocket.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Menace to Society
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 75 A serial predator leaves a trail of bodies along the southeastern United States.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Burial He Wanted
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 76 The disappearance of a wealthy retiree in South Florida quickly turns from a missing person's case to a full blown homicide investigation.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Green Widow
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 77 The murder of a man inside his suburban Los Angeles home sets off a chain reaction of murder, conspiracy, and furious cover ups, which ultimately point back to a mastermind who's in it for the money.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Oh, Deer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 38 When her husband threatens her with divorce, an Arkansas hunter sets the scene for a tragic accident that's actually a murder.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Foul Plié
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 39 A ballet dancer is bludgeoned to death with her own point shoes, and investigators find a bookish body double waiting in the wings.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Blaze Of Glory
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 Sisko attempts to force his traitorous former officer to stop a final Maquis attack that could lead to the destruction of the Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Empok Nor
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 24 O'Brien, Garak, Nog, and a salvage team are stranded on a supposedly abandoned Cardassian space station.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - In The Cards
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 Jake and Nog risk an intergalactic incident in an innocent quest to lift Sisko's spirits.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Call To Arms
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 Deep Space Nine prepares to face a Dominion/Cardassian attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - A Time To Stand
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 Sisko and his crew embark on a secret mission in a captured Jem'Hadar warship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Rocks And Shoals
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 Sisko and his crew are stranded on a remote planet with a dying Vorta and a small group of Jem'Hadar.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Sons And Daughters
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 Worf must face his failures as a father when his estranged son volunteers for duty aboard a Klingon ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Behind The Lines
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 While Sisko's promotion takes him away from the Defiant, Odo's loyalties are tested by the arrival of a fellow Shapeshifter.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Favor The Bold
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 While Kira prepares for the destruction of the Federation minefield, Sisko plans to retake Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Sacrifice Of Angels
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 When the minefield is soon to be demolished, Sisko leads a mission to take back Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - You Are Cordially Invited
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Worf's plans for a traditional Klingon wedding are threatened when Martok's wife refuses to accept Dax into their family.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Resurrection
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 The alternate universe double of Kira's slain love requests asylum on Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Statistical Probabilities
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Genetically engineered savants under Bashir's supervision predict doom for the Federation.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.
